data.name: Deadly Rain
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


Join our Discord to chat about the game, help with its development, and participate in the beta test and key giveaway.


About the Game


Deadly Rain is a Survival Horror FPS game that puts you in a terrifying fight for survival against hordes of scary mutants in a toxic, rainy and abandoned archipelago. Look for and save resources to stay alive in the worst and unexpected situations.

Features:

  • FPS and stealth based gameplay.
  • Fight against hordes of ever bigger and stronger mutants.
  • Explore the atmospheric open world of a toxic, abandoned archipelago.
  • Manage your ammo and gas mask filters well.
  • Change the filter in your gas mask regularly or die from air poisoning.
  • Inspired by AAA games like Left 4 Dead, Silent Hill and Resident Evil 7.
